name: Lightless (itch) (Titan132)
description:
A quick action horror game for short breaks.

You are not alone

It was made for Brackeys game jam.

(If anyone knows can you please tell me why webgl wont work. I tried changing the compression to gzip and disabled and tried turning on the development build. Any help is appriciated)

How to play:

WASD - movement

left click - shoot

right click - flashlight

Goal is to pickup as many checkpoints  as you can in the dark. On each checkpoint you can pick an upgrade and get some ammo. Watch out for your ammo and battery on a flashlight. But beware... YOU ARE NOT ALONE.



Thanks for playing!
